document.full_text: an upstate new york man was sentenced to 18 years in prison on wednesday for the attempted murder of his wife whom he shot four times as she sat in a bath tub, authorities said.
document.title: husband sentenced to 18 years for bathtub shooting of wife
lines_and_colors: an upstate new york man was sentenced to 18 years in prison on wednesday for the attempted murder of his wife whom he shot four times as she sat in a bath tub, authorities said.
